name: Amendola - Sun Grown - Padrino
additionalNotes: Based out of Durham, North Carolina, Amendola is led by Jeffrey Amendola, who is more than proud to carry the first-generation flag for his eponymous brand. Made at El Paraiso in Danli, Honduras, the Amendola Sun Grown features a flawless Sun Grown Sumatra wrapper on top of an aged Nicaraguan binder and a gourmet mix of Dominican and Nicaraguan fillers to provide a bold medium-bodied smoking experience offering notes of espresso, earth, wood, and spice.
